import React from 'react'; import '../Css/ElectronicsFilter.css'; import all from '../Images/5110770.png' import Babydress from '../Images/BabyDress.png'; import diapers from '../Images/diapers.png'; const BabyFilter = ({ selectedSubCategory, onSubCategoryChange, onPriceChange }) => { return(
onBrandChange('')}>
All Mobile's
onBrandChange('BabyDress')}>
Clothing
onBrandChange('diapers')}>
Diapers and Changing
onPriceChange(parseInt(e.target.value, 10))} />
{selectedPrice} /-
); }; export default BabyFilter;
